title: Redesigning Digital Learning Theory: Scenario-Based UDL (Universal Design for Learning) Integrated Education

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: A hands-on course for working professionals to strengthen mathematics instructional design competencies, considering smartphone-based learning environments

learning_goals: Learners can scenario-based analyze and design solutions for at least three digital learning challenges that may occur in real educational settings.
Learners can produce at least two types of mathematics instructional materials addressing diverse learner needs in accordance with UDL principles.
Learners can develop mobile-optimized microlearning modules applying evaluation criteria across at least three levels.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
